document_data.name: Caldreth's Cobbling
document_data.mainbody: '''Caldreth's Cobbling''' was a shop in the town of [[Mornbryn's Shield]]
document_data.Services: [[Caldreth Wyvernlyng]] repaired shoes, boots, and cloaks. He also produced high, heavy leather boots that were waxed and waterproof, suitable for wading in streams, rivers, and lakes.
